Minor in Supply Chain & Logistics: Minor in Supply Chain & Logistics The minor in Supply Chain and Logistics (SCL) is designed for students who are majoring in non-SCL subjects. This minor will provide the non-SCL students an understanding about how a supply chain works and the integration process of a supply chain with other functional areas of an organization. Having this minor will help students because many non-SCL jobs have close interactions with SCL topics. Must have a minimum of 12 letter-graded credits completed at Rowan University (transfer credits are not applicable) Must have no more than 90 earned credits (senior status) on Rowan University record Must have a College of Business major declared at Rowan University (except SCL major) Must have a minimum 2.500 cumulative GPA Must contact a Rohrer College of Business Academic Advisor to declare minor Contact your current assigned academic advisor to officially declare the minor
